Hanatarash(i)!

ハナタラシ

Hanatarashi, or Hanatarash, meaning "sniveler" or "snot-nosed" in Japanese, are a two-piece noise band from Osaka, Japan. Composed of vocalist, visual artist Yamantaka Eye and guitarist Mitsuru Tabata, the band focus on the obscure music genres of Japanoise, industrial, and advant-punk. Hanatarash are well known in the live music scene for their ridiculous and, quite frankly, dangerous live performances that have brought up the question, “Can a bulldozer be used as an instrument?”.


Check out our tour schedule and merchandise and if you think we're the right fit for your event, be it a wedding or a building demolition, send us a booking enquiry and we'll be there to make your day extra special!
